remarks: Two ways to express restriction of a support set.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Feb-2015.)  Obsolete version of ~ fnsuppres as of 28-May-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement: fnsuppresOLD $p |- ( ( F Fn ( A u. B ) /\ ( A i^i B ) = (/) /\ Z e. V ) -> ( ( `' F " ( _V \ { Z } ) ) C_ A <-> ( F |` B ) = ( B X. { Z } ) ) ) $.
